Notably, there are enemies (represented by '@') around positions (6, 13) and (6, 11) which may pose a threat, potentially blocking movement toward collecting more resources or reaching the exit.

To advance effectively while minimizing risk, the next best action is to move left to (6, 11), which may allow me to position better or interact further with items right away (potentially breaking or transforming items).
